text: Motion

(Soon, it will be time for the debut live show to start...
What am I supposed to do if I'm nervous...!)
Manoー! I think there's something wrong with my back...! ?
Motion

It's okay, Meguru-chan...
You look great...!

Ehehe, thanks...!
Phew... I'm kind of restless...!
That's right... this is, our first time.
Hey, let's put our hands together like this...!
Motion

...How strange,
It's kind of... calming.

Yes, it's true...
Thanks, Meguru-chan!
Motion

Howa... 
Are they, calling us──...?
It's true. You can hear it.
Motion

I, love the name Illumination STARS
that Producer-san gave us.

Yepp.
Before I knew it, I really fits us.

I loved it from the beginning!
I can't wait to share the sparkle with all our fans!
Motion
Motion

Okay, here we go...
Let's bring our briliance to everyone...
Illumination STARS!
(...Ah, they're all so dazzling...)

(This brilliance they're showing here──...
I hope it reaches people everywhere──...! )
